Container.Overview: Automatically generates theme clips from movie collections for media servers like Plex, Jellyfin, and Emby. Uses intelligent analysis methods (visual, audio, music) and Intel GPU acceleration for fast processing.
Container.Requires: Intel GPU with VAAPI support for hardware acceleration

Config.Name: Variable: CLIP_LENGTH
Config.Description: Length of theme clips in seconds (10-30 recommended)

Config.Name: Variable: METHOD
Config.Description: Analysis method: visual (dynamic scenes), audio (high activity), music (harmonic content), random

Config.Name: Variable: USE_GPU
Config.Description: Enable Intel GPU hardware acceleration (requires Intel GPU)

Config.Name: Variable: START_BUFFER
Config.Description: Skip first N seconds of movie (avoid intros/credits)

Config.Name: Variable: END_IGNORE_PCT
Config.Description: Ignore last N% of movie (0.3 = 30%, avoids credits)

Config.Name: Variable: LOG_LEVEL
Config.Description: Logging level: DEBUG, INFO, WARNING, ERROR
